scripts.test: npm run test-compiler && npm run test-sexp-parser && npm run test-parser
scripts.test-ocaml-compiler: extended/ocaml-compiler/build.sh && IMPL=extended/ocaml-compiler npm run test-extended && IMPL=extended/ocaml-compiler npm run test-minimal
scripts.test-minimal-compiler: rm -fR generated/tests && extended/minimal-compiler/build.sh && IMPL=extended/minimal-compiler npm run test-minimal && IMPL=extended/minimal-compiler npm run test-extended
